title: Naruto
description: A young ninja, Naruto Uzumaki, dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and leader of his village while carrying the burden of a sealed demon fox within him.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it, leading to a battle of wits with a genius detective.

title: Attack on Titan
description: In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant man-eating Titans, young soldiers fight to protect what remains behind massive walls.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy in their quest to restore their bodies after a failed ritual, uncovering deep secrets about their world and its hidden power.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his crew sail across the seas in search of the ultimate treasure, the One Piece, while facing powerful foes and uncovering the world's mysteries.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A boy joins the Demon Slayer Corps to save his sister who was turned into a demon.
